history.action: Introduced In House - Assigned to Transportation, Housing & Local Government
House Committee on Transportation, Housing & Local Government Refer Amended to House Committee of the Whole
House Second Reading Laid Over Daily - No Amendments
House Second Reading Special Order - Passed with Amendments - Committee, Floor
House Third Reading Passed - No Amendments
Introduced In Senate - Assigned to Local Government & Housing
Senate Committee on Local Government & Housing Refer Amended to Senate Committee of the Whole
Senate Second Reading Laid Over Daily - No Amendments
Senate Second Reading Passed with Amendments - Committee, Floor
Senate Third Reading Passed with Amendments - Floor
House Considered Senate Amendments - Result was to Laid Over Daily
House Considered Senate Amendments - Result was to Concur - Repass
Signed by the Speaker of the House
Signed by the President of the Senate

House: Senate Amendments Concur
House: Senate Amendments Repass
